alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 9:44AM CDT until May 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Marshall, Walsh, Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Marshall, Polk, Walsh and Grand Forks Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Clay and Cass Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Oslo. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. County Road 2 south of Oslo is closed in sections 2 and 11 of Pulaski Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 27.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Friday was 27.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue falling to 25.6 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
